ing: 3/4 cup milk, or more to taste
2 tablespoons peanut butter, or more to taste
des: "This tastes almost like a pb and j sandwich! It's a great post-workout recovery drink, but satisfying enough to be dessert. You can use non-dairy milk if you prefer."
ins: Combine blueberries, milk, protein powder, and peanut butter in a blender; blend until smooth.
